story:
Introducing the Physics of Guitar Playing® Foundations Course

"Ninety percent of this game is mental. The other half is physical."
                                     -Baseball great Yogi Berra

In development for over a decade at the Physics of Guitar Playing® Institute, our course addresses a real problem in the world of guitar teaching and playing: Most guitar players are only taught WHAT to PLAY, not HOW to PLAY WELL. Students memorize songs, scales, and chords without any real idea of how to play with the effortlessness and precision of a pro.

The Foundations Course—based on technical wisdom from classical and flamenco guitar teachers but designed for non-classical players—gives guitar players of all styles the tools they need to play great. With “Chalk Talk” classroom-style videos, workbooks, and tutoring, frustrated students can finally understand why they don’t play expertly, why others do, and how to hone their technique until they can play great guitar too.

Join us as we set out to create better guitar players the world over and make guitar more fun to play—and listen to.

 

Play Guitar, But Still Can't Shred?

You want to make clean chord changes and shred through scales and songs. But despite lessons, books, and videos, you still can’t blaze. You're stuck. You suck. It’s not your fault!

Going Nowhere?

 

  • Are you struggling to play great?
  • Can’t make fast, clean changes?
  • Do your hands feel clumsy, unable to do what you want them to do?
  • Ready to jump into the big leagues but you just can’t seem to push your playing to that pro level?

Getting No Help?

  • Bought stacks of books filled with scales or songs, but they didn’t teach how to play great, just what to play?
  • Signed up for online courses or bought DVD’s and still didn’t learn how to play?
  • Asked teachers how they play as well as they do, but found they can’t explain it?


There's A Reason You Can't Play Great:


You’ve only Learned WHAT to PLAY, Not HOW TO PLAY GREAT!

Scale charts like this are for memorizing.

They don’t show you how to get your fingers to play at a professional level. You may have memorized chords, scales, and songs, but that’s not enough.

The sad secret is most teachers don’t “teach” how to play well—they just walk students through what to play, never cracking the question of how. See the difference?

There are underlying principles of why some people are great players, and once you understand them, you can apply them to your own playing—and shred. No “blues” or “rock” chords and licks. Just how to play great—because that’s what you need.

Just Learning What to Play Won't Cut It

It Won’t Happen By Learning More Scales & Chords.

Learning scales and chords is simple memorization, and you can spend $100 on books and videos to memorize for 10 years. What you need is someone to show you how to play great. That’s what we do!

Playing Guitar is a Gas When You Can Play Great

Remember when, as a kid, you’d lie in bed, wishing you could wake up and play like a guitar god? Now, it can happen! It will take some time, some discipline, some study. But it won’t take forever. In as few as three months, you’ll see a huge improvement, and in 12 months, you can double your skills. This time next year, you can be playing at the pro level.
 

Ready to Play Like a Pro?

What if you could double your playing skills in the next 12 months? What if this time next year you could have the kind of chops and speed you’ve always wanted? 

Finally, You Can Play Great

When You Learn the SECRETS Behind How to Play Guitar.

Many of these secrets of technique come from the world of classical and flamenco guitar. Top classical guitarists don’t just know how to play incredibly difficult music—they are taught how to play. And you can be taught how to play your style of guitar—and do it with ease, precision, and speed.

Classical Guitarists Often Perform Music That Seems Impossible to Play

They’ve been taught to understand the mechanics—the physics—of playing (how their hands and fingers work best), how to think like a musician, and they’ve learned to practice in a way that produces a high level of playing. In short, they’ve learned the Physics of Guitar Playing®. These 17 concepts—aka AXioms™—can help make the most challenging passages easy, and our expert instructors have adapted these for rock, blues, jazz, and all non-classical players.

Double your chops in 12 months: POG = YG^2
(Physics of Guitar Playing® = Your Guitar Skills, Squared)

By understanding concepts of physiology, straight-line movement vs. curved-line movement, weight, mental tension, practice efficiency, the psychology of error-free playing, “muscle memory,” and more—all presented in an easy-to-understand format.

The Physics of Guitar Playing® Foundations Course Will Shift Your Playing Into Overdrive

Now you can learn these principles and techniques with our 17 video AXioms™. You’ll understand how to play great, and you’ll make playing look as easy as brushing your teeth. This course is about how to rock in any style, rock, blues, jazz, or shred. And good technique, based upon reducing your workload and using the correct mechanics, can reduce common player injuries.

No - We're Not Going to Teach You "Classical Guitar"

That's not the point. Whatever your style, you'll learn to think, practice, and play like a pro.

Here's Just Some of What You'll Learn About:

  • How your hands naturally function in everyday life — and why they fail you on guitar.
  • The left hand “approach” that seems to make your fingers longer.
  • How to eliminate the excessive muscle tension in your hands that robs you of the ability of change chords cleanly and play fast scales.
  • How you can “work” at making playing easy and completely effortless.
  • Why gravity is a guitarist’s best friend.
  • Why ”slow-mo” practice creates flawless, professional-level guitar playing.
  • What guitarists can learn from race car drivers about going fast.
  • The difference between “linear” and “curvilinear” motion and the astonishing effect this difference makes when shifting across the fingerboard. (It’s easy to learn!)
  • Why the way you change chords now is so inefficient that chord changes are far tougher than they should be.
  • Why you don’t even need your guitar to learn a new piece of music.
  • Why your upper knuckles are the key to blazing finger-picking.

Upstage Friends. Sit In On Elite Jam Sessions. Form a Band. Absolutely Rule At the Guitar Store. 

Because now you’ll be able to make clean, fast chord changes. You’ll shred scales at the speed of light. Now, finally, you can take everything to the pro level, whether you want to get famous, front a local band, or just show off.

 

Answers to Your Questions

Q: Who is the Physics of Guitar Playing Foundations Course for?

A: Okay, we’re biased, but we can’t think of many guitar players who wouldn’t benefit, from near-beginner to advanced to pro. If you’re a player who knows everything about technique, you might pass—but if you’re always seeking new info this course is for you. Hey, playing really great is everything you thought it'd be. Here’s your ticket to all of that.

Q: How much do I have to practice?

A: More important than practice quantity is practice quality and consistency. Many players make headway with a 1/2  hour of great practice five days a week; most can’t excel with three hours of sloppy, occasional practice. Don’t skip more than a few days at a time. Always seek to improve, not just practice your mistakes.

Q: Is this about the “secrets” of classical guitar technique?

A: To some extent, yes. That said, the 17 AXioms™ of our Foundations Course are based on nuggets of teaching wisdom that cross style lines and are universal, designed to help jazz, rock, blues, acoustic, and players of all styles play better. 

Q: I see you have different options for the Foundations Course. Which version should I get?

A: This depends on whether you're a beginner or intermediate-advanced (our courses are labeled for either beginner or intermediate and above), how fast you want to learn, your budget. Your choices include the Foundations Course “Chalk Talk” videos with animation and workbook, the Foundations Course Supplemental Video, the 10-Minute Foundations Workout Course, and all of the above with online tutoring.

Q: I think great playing is all about talent—so how can this course help?

A: Well, first off, we strongly disagree. Yes, there are genuine talents—Hendrix, for instance—to whom, perhaps, guitar playing came easily (though we’re pretty sure he practiced—a lot and with great precision). They are one in a million. Still, most of the best guitarists worked at it; just ask them.

Q: How tough is the material to understand?

A: The material is understandable to most, even very young players who have someone to help them. Some of the concepts involve seemingly simple ideas, such as slow practice. Some involve more complex ideas, such as understanding systems and motion. But with a little patience, nearly anyone can master the material.

Q: How do I get the most out of this course?

A: First: Like the karate student who should do what the instructor says at first, POG students do best when taking each AXiom™ to heart before trying to tweak it.

Second: While you don’t have to practice hours a day, consistent practice while applying the technical lessons will optimize your results.

Third: It’s best to stick with one AXiom™ at a time, applying the technique until it is a habit before jumping from one AXiom™ to another. (Note that we include a practice guide for getting the most out of the course.)

Who Should Get the Course?

Are you intellectually curious? Do you wonder exactly how to make your fingers work better? Do enjoy studying and practicing? Does the idea of a scientific approach to playing appeal to you? Do you want to get better fast and out-shred nearly everyone? If you answered yes to these questions, then you’re a Physics of Guitar Playing® Institute kind of guitar player!

Who Shouldn't Get the Course?

It’s important to us that the right people invest in our courses. While we believe that nearly any player can benefit, we would rather turn away those not the best fit. Some who should consider NOT joining us: Students who think they can learn to play great in a few months, students who never practice, students who already know everything, and those not interested in a scientific (we might say “nerdy”) approach. Please review this entire page and the sample videos; if the information doesn’t click, perhaps our courses aren’t for you. But if they do, join us!

But What If I'm Just Starting Out?

Even if you’ve never played, you can surpass your more experienced friends by learning the right way, right away. While the Foundations Course is primarily geared toward those with experience, using the course in conjunction with lessons, and with our Beginner’s Guide to Playing Guitar, can jumpstart your playing. It can help you play better than people with more experience because you will truly understand how to think and play like a pro guitarist.

What Students Say:

 

Our Advisory Team

Meet the Experts from Physics of Guitar Institute!

Chief Course Advisor: Bruce Arnold

Bruce Arnold has taught at some of the most prestigious music schools in America, including the New England Conservatory of Music, Dartmouth, Berklee, and he currently teaches at Princeton and City College of New York. Mr. Arnold is director of the New York University Summer Guitar Intensive, a program focusing on advanced improvisational skills, where Mr. Arnold's hand-picked faculty reads like a Who's Who of guitar players and educators.

Course Advisor: Scott Allen

Scott Allen is a Musicians Institute (G.I.T) graduate whose band Scott Allen Project has opened for national acts such as Lynch Mob, Michael Schenker, Gary Hoey, Dave Meniketti of Y&T, Eric Gales and more. While attending Musicians Institute, Scott studied with Steve Trovato, Nick Nolan, Keith Wyatt, Paul Hanson, Frank Gambale, Brett Garsed, T.J Helmerich, Scott Henderson, Tommy Tedesco, Daniel Gilbert, and Tom Kolb. Scott has been an instructor, performer, recording artist and session player since graduating from G.I.T in 1996.

Consulting Physicist: James Goff

Jeff Goff is a Laboratory Instructor, Physics, at Colorado Mesa University.
He also provides expertise in chemistry, physics, computation, and materials science for product development and educational resources, advises in data work-up and management,
and performs independent, theoretical research in chemical development.

Consulting Engineer: Jose Salazar


Dr. Jose Salazar (Ph.D, Biomechanical Engineering, Newcastle University)

Director, Physics of Guitar Institute: Jeff White

Jeff White, MBA, CFP, formerly of Hughes Aircraft/Raytheon is a lifelong guitarist, a member of Los Angeles del Tango Ensemble, and has always wanted to be Keith Richards.

Creator, Physics of Guitar Institute: Trill Hammeron

Trill Hammeron is the pen name of the creator of the Physics of Guitar Institute. A versatile, classically-trained guitarist who has studied with some of the world’s finest guitarists, “Trill” is a ghostwriter and “ghostplayer,” and has spent over two decades creating the Physics of Guitar Playing Foundations course.

 

INTRODUCING:

The Physics of Guitar Playing® Foundations Course

Your Struggle to Play Better Is Over.

The Foundations Course will teach you 17 key concepts (what we call AXioms™) of technique, practice, musicianship and more, explaining the mechanics of great playing and the art of musical expression in a way that will forever elevate your guitar playing.

  • HERE’S WHAT YOU’LL GET:

  • 17 video lessons, taught “Chalk Talk” classroom-style by an instructor and which include custom animation.
  • The course workbook eBook, featuring text transcriptions of the video lessons, tips, and practice ideas to help you get great as fast as possible.
  • Access to your Physics of Guitar Playing® Foundations Course online anywhere, anytime, from your device or desktop computer.

You won’t get another blinding array of chords and scales. You’ll get the “how to play like a pro” keys, the complete bundle of high-performance secrets to stunning technique, blazing speed, and perfect, musical playing—all for the price of about a month of traditional lessons.

Access everything online anytime. You just have to learn the concepts, apply them to your playing, and get better. And you will.

NOTE: All Indiegogo supporters will become “Legacy” members of the Physics of Guitar Playing® Institute! Enjoy access to your personal Legacy Page, with special lessons, freebies, discounts, and other great benefits—for life.

Watch excerpts from the Video below:

 

 

 

And Check Out These Other Items...

The Foundations Course is at the center of everything you’ll learn. Then the supplemental videos, the 10-Minute Foundations Workout, and our online tutoring will clarify and reinforce what you’ve learned, helping you apply your new understanding and skill set to the instrument. Check ’em out!

Plus, we guarantee delivery of your course or we will refund your money.

 

The Foundations Video Supplement  

A potent addition to the Physics of Guitar Playing® Foundations Course, the supplemental videos include state-of-the-art animation and hands-on guitar demonstrations of key concepts from the Foundation Course’s 17 AXiom™ lessons.

Watch excerpts from the Videos below:

 

 

 

  The 10-Minute Foundations Workout  

This video course helps you apply what you’ve learned! It teaches you a short but comprehensive set of warmup “calisthenics,” demonstrated on guitar, that allow you to apply the 17 Foundations Course AXioms™. Hone your technique as you build understanding, knowledge, speed, dexterity, and finger independence—all in a quick, 10-minute daily workout.

 

  Online Tutoring  

As you learn the Physics of Guitar Playing® materials, you will be assisted by a certified teacher online who will answer your forum questions and every week give you feedback and instruction from videos you submit, all on your personal Student Learning Page on any device. Learn to play great even faster!

 

  Beginner's Intro to Guitar eBook & Video

  • Most beginner “methods” are too complicated and detailed, and call for premature multitasking. In addition, this information is often randomly presented.
    • The result? Students are soon overwhelmed, confused, frustrated—and they often quit.
  • With our beginner’s introduction to guitar, you won’t get overwhelmed.
    • Favoring quality over quantity, this course gets you started by presenting a limited amount of information—offered in a logical, one-task-at-a-time fashion—that is designed to be both manageable and digestible.

This simple introduction will give you essential skills without overwhelming you and offers a logical order of simple techniques to learn, one at a time. If you are a guitar teacher, consider using this as an intro book and video course for beginning students.

  Chords, Scales & Licks eBook  

In case you are aren't buried under these already, you can use this eBook, crammed with more scales, chords, and licks than most of us could use in five lifetimes. Memorize ’em. Collect ’em. Trade ’em with your friends. And then use what you learn from the Physics of Guitar Playing® Foundations Course to put them to use like a pro.

 

  The Physics of Guitar Playing Embroidered Cap  

 

White hat, black brim— a high-quality hat with our logo embroidered up front! Your melon never looked better.

 Upcoming Courses, Free Sites & More 
 

Courses

  • Physics of Guitar Playing® for Kids
  • ​Musicianship
  • Performance
  • Advanced Foundations
  • Advanced Techiques
  • Teaching 
  • Practice
  • Right Hand Technique: Picking & Fingerpicking
  • Read Music In One Week

Free Sites (In Progress)

  • ​RockGuitarWiki.org
  • BluesGuitarWiki.org
  • JazzGuitarWiki
  • PhysicsOfGuitarInstitute.org
  • FreeGuitarLessonsOnline.org

The Physics of Guitar Playing Certified Private Teacher's Program 

Now seeking private instructors nationwide to be certified by Physics of Guitar Playing!® If you are an experienced teacher, and are interested in becoming certified and have us send you interested students, please contact us a the top right of page with "Ask a Question."

 

Business Member, GFA

 

Promotional Videos
story_txt:
Introducing the Physics of Guitar Playing® Foundations Course
"Ninety percent of this game is mental. The other half is physical."                                     -Baseball great Yogi BerraIn development for over a decade at the Physics of Guitar Playing® Institute, our course addresses a real problem in the world of guitar teaching and playing: Most guitar players are only taught WHAT to PLAY, not HOW to PLAY WELL. Students memorize songs, scales, and chords without any real idea of how to play with the effortlessness and precision of a pro.The Foundations Course—based on technical wisdom from classical and flamenco guitar teachers but designed for non-classical players—gives guitar players of all styles the tools they need to play great. With “Chalk Talk” classroom-style videos, workbooks, and tutoring, frustrated students can finally understand why they don’t play expertly, why others do, and how to hone their technique until they can play great guitar too.Join us as we set out to create better guitar players the world over and make guitar more fun to play—and listen to. Play Guitar, But Still Can't Shred?You want to make clean chord changes and shred through scales and songs. But despite lessons, books, and videos, you still can’t blaze. You're stuck. You suck. It’s not your fault!Going Nowhere? 
Are you struggling to play great?
Can’t make fast, clean changes?
Do your hands feel clumsy, unable to do what you want them to do?
Ready to jump into the big leagues but you just can’t seem to push your playing to that pro level?
Getting No Help?
Bought stacks of books filled with scales or songs, but they didn’t teach how to play great, just what to play?
Signed up for online courses or bought DVD’s and still didn’t learn how to play?
Asked teachers how they play as well as they do, but found they can’t explain it?

There's A Reason You Can't Play Great:
You’ve only Learned WHAT to PLAY, Not HOW TO PLAY GREAT!Scale charts like this are for memorizing.They don’t show you how to get your fingers to play at a professional level. You may have memorized chords, scales, and songs, but that’s not enough.The sad secret is most teachers don’t “teach” how to play well—they just walk students through what to play, never cracking the question of how. See the difference?There are underlying principles of why some people are great players, and once you understand them, you can apply them to your own playing—and shred. No “blues” or “rock” chords and licks. Just how to play great—because that’s what you need.Just Learning What to Play Won't Cut ItIt Won’t Happen By Learning More Scales & Chords.Learning scales and chords is simple memorization, and you can spend $100 on books and videos to memorize for 10 years. What you need is someone to show you how to play great. That’s what we do!Playing Guitar is a Gas When You Can Play GreatRemember when, as a kid, you’d lie in bed, wishing you could wake up and play like a guitar god? Now, it can happen! It will take some time, some discipline, some study. But it won’t take forever. In as few as three months, you’ll see a huge improvement, and in 12 months, you can double your skills. This time next year, you can be playing at the pro level. Ready to Play Like a Pro?What if you could double your playing skills in the next 12 months? What if this time next year you could have the kind of chops and speed you’ve always wanted? Finally, You Can Play GreatWhen You Learn the SECRETS Behind How to Play Guitar.Many of these secrets of technique come from the world of classical and flamenco guitar. Top classical guitarists don’t just know how to play incredibly difficult music—they are taught how to play. And you can be taught how to play your style of guitar—and do it with ease, precision, and speed.Classical Guitarists Often Perform Music That Seems Impossible to PlayThey’ve been taught to understand the mechanics—the physics—of playing (how their hands and fingers work best), how to think like a musician, and they’ve learned to practice in a way that produces a high level of playing. In short, they’ve learned the Physics of Guitar Playing®. These 17 concepts—aka AXioms™—can help make the most challenging passages easy, and our expert instructors have adapted these for rock, blues, jazz, and all non-classical players.Double your chops in 12 months: POG = YG^2(Physics of Guitar Playing® = Your Guitar Skills, Squared)By understanding concepts of physiology, straight-line movement vs. curved-line movement, weight, mental tension, practice efficiency, the psychology of error-free playing, “muscle memory,” and more—all presented in an easy-to-understand format.The Physics of Guitar Playing® Foundations Course Will Shift Your Playing Into OverdriveNow you can learn these principles and techniques with our 17 video AXioms™. You’ll understand how to play great, and you’ll make playing look as easy as brushing your teeth. This course is about how to rock in any style, rock, blues, jazz, or shred. And good technique, based upon reducing your workload and using the correct mechanics, can reduce common player injuries.No - We're Not Going to Teach You "Classical Guitar"That's not the point. Whatever your style, you'll learn to think, practice, and play like a pro.Here's Just Some of What You'll Learn About:
How your hands naturally function in everyday life — and why they fail you on guitar.
The left hand “approach” that seems to make your fingers longer.
How to eliminate the excessive muscle tension in your hands that robs you of the ability of change chords cleanly and play fast scales.
How you can “work” at making playing easy and completely effortless.
Why gravity is a guitarist’s best friend.
Why ”slow-mo” practice creates flawless, professional-level guitar playing.
What guitarists can learn from race car drivers about going fast.
The difference between “linear” and “curvilinear” motion and the astonishing effect this difference makes when shifting across the fingerboard. (It’s easy to learn!)
Why the way you change chords now is so inefficient that chord changes are far tougher than they should be.
Why you don’t even need your guitar to learn a new piece of music.
Why your upper knuckles are the key to blazing finger-picking.
Upstage Friends. Sit In On Elite Jam Sessions. Form a Band. Absolutely Rule At the Guitar Store. Because now you’ll be able to make clean, fast chord changes. You’ll shred scales at the speed of light. Now, finally, you can take everything to the pro level, whether you want to get famous, front a local band, or just show off. Answers to Your Questions
Q: Who is the Physics of Guitar Playing Foundations Course for?A: Okay, we’re biased, but we can’t think of many guitar players who wouldn’t benefit, from near-beginner to advanced to pro. If you’re a player who knows everything about technique, you might pass—but if you’re always seeking new info this course is for you. Hey, playing really great is everything you thought it'd be. Here’s your ticket to all of that.Q: How much do I have to practice?A: More important than practice quantity is practice quality and consistency. Many players make headway with a 1/2  hour of great practice five days a week; most can’t excel with three hours of sloppy, occasional practice. Don’t skip more than a few days at a time. Always seek to improve, not just practice your mistakes.Q: Is this about the “secrets” of classical guitar technique?A: To some extent, yes. That said, the 17 AXioms™ of our Foundations Course are based on nuggets of teaching wisdom that cross style lines and are universal, designed to help jazz, rock, blues, acoustic, and players of all styles play better. Q: I see you have different options for the Foundations Course. Which version should I get?A: This depends on whether you're a beginner or intermediate-advanced (our courses are labeled for either beginner or intermediate and above), how fast you want to learn, your budget. Your choices include the Foundations Course “Chalk Talk” videos with animation and workbook, the Foundations Course Supplemental Video, the 10-Minute Foundations Workout Course, and all of the above with online tutoring.Q: I think great playing is all about talent—so how can this course help?A: Well, first off, we strongly disagree. Yes, there are genuine talents—Hendrix, for instance—to whom, perhaps, guitar playing came easily (though we’re pretty sure he practiced—a lot and with great precision). They are one in a million. Still, most of the best guitarists worked at it; just ask them.Q: How tough is the material to understand?A: The material is understandable to most, even very young players who have someone to help them. Some of the concepts involve seemingly simple ideas, such as slow practice. Some involve more complex ideas, such as understanding systems and motion. But with a little patience, nearly anyone can master the material.Q: How do I get the most out of this course?A: First: Like the karate student who should do what the instructor says at first, POG students do best when taking each AXiom™ to heart before trying to tweak it.Second: While you don’t have to practice hours a day, consistent practice while applying the technical lessons will optimize your results.Third: It’s best to stick with one AXiom™ at a time, applying the technique until it is a habit before jumping from one AXiom™ to another. (Note that we include a practice guide for getting the most out of the course.)Who Should Get the Course?Are you intellectually curious? Do you wonder exactly how to make your fingers work better? Do enjoy studying and practicing? Does the idea of a scientific approach to playing appeal to you? Do you want to get better fast and out-shred nearly everyone? If you answered yes to these questions, then you’re a Physics of Guitar Playing® Institute kind of guitar player!Who Shouldn't Get the Course?It’s important to us that the right people invest in our courses. While we believe that nearly any player can benefit, we would rather turn away those not the best fit. Some who should consider NOT joining us: Students who think they can learn to play great in a few months, students who never practice, students who already know everything, and those not interested in a scientific (we might say “nerdy”) approach. Please review this entire page and the sample videos; if the information doesn’t click, perhaps our courses aren’t for you. But if they do, join us!But What If I'm Just Starting Out?Even if you’ve never played, you can surpass your more experienced friends by learning the right way, right away. While the Foundations Course is primarily geared toward those with experience, using the course in conjunction with lessons, and with our Beginner’s Guide to Playing Guitar, can jumpstart your playing. It can help you play better than people with more experience because you will truly understand how to think and play like a pro guitarist.What Students Say: Our Advisory TeamMeet the Experts from Physics of Guitar Institute!Chief Course Advisor: Bruce ArnoldBruce Arnold has taught at some of the most prestigious music schools in America, including the New England Conservatory of Music, Dartmouth, Berklee, and he currently teaches at Princeton and City College of New York. Mr. Arnold is director of the New York University Summer Guitar Intensive, a program focusing on advanced improvisational skills, where Mr. Arnold's hand-picked faculty reads like a Who's Who of guitar players and educators.Course Advisor: Scott AllenScott Allen is a Musicians Institute (G.I.T) graduate whose band Scott Allen Project has opened for national acts such as Lynch Mob, Michael Schenker, Gary Hoey, Dave Meniketti of Y&T, Eric Gales and more. While attending Musicians Institute, Scott studied with Steve Trovato, Nick Nolan, Keith Wyatt, Paul Hanson, Frank Gambale, Brett Garsed, T.J Helmerich, Scott Henderson, Tommy Tedesco, Daniel Gilbert, and Tom Kolb. Scott has been an instructor, performer, recording artist and session player since graduating from G.I.T in 1996.Consulting Physicist: James GoffJeff Goff is a Laboratory Instructor, Physics, at Colorado Mesa University.He also provides expertise in chemistry, physics, computation, and materials science for product development and educational resources, advises in data work-up and management,and performs independent, theoretical research in chemical development.Consulting Engineer: Jose SalazarDr. Jose Salazar (Ph.D, Biomechanical Engineering, Newcastle University)Director, Physics of Guitar Institute: Jeff WhiteJeff White, MBA, CFP, formerly of Hughes Aircraft/Raytheon is a lifelong guitarist, a member of Los Angeles del Tango Ensemble, and has always wanted to be Keith Richards.Creator, Physics of Guitar Institute: Trill HammeronTrill Hammeron is the pen name of the creator of the Physics of Guitar Institute. A versatile, classically-trained guitarist who has studied with some of the world’s finest guitarists, “Trill” is a ghostwriter and “ghostplayer,” and has spent over two decades creating the Physics of Guitar Playing Foundations course. INTRODUCING:The Physics of Guitar Playing® Foundations CourseYour Struggle to Play Better Is Over.The Foundations Course will teach you 17 key concepts (what we call AXioms™) of technique, practice, musicianship and more, explaining the mechanics of great playing and the art of musical expression in a way that will forever elevate your guitar playing.
HERE’S WHAT YOU’LL GET:
17 video lessons, taught “Chalk Talk” classroom-style by an instructor and which include custom animation.
The course workbook eBook, featuring text transcriptions of the video lessons, tips, and practice ideas to help you get great as fast as possible.
Access to your Physics of Guitar Playing® Foundations Course online anywhere, anytime, from your device or desktop computer.
You won’t get another blinding array of chords and scales. You’ll get the “how to play like a pro” keys, the complete bundle of high-performance secrets to stunning technique, blazing speed, and perfect, musical playing—all for the price of about a month of traditional lessons.Access everything online anytime. You just have to learn the concepts, apply them to your playing, and get better. And you will.NOTE: All Indiegogo supporters will become “Legacy” members of the Physics of Guitar Playing® Institute! Enjoy access to your personal Legacy Page, with special lessons, freebies, discounts, and other great benefits—for life.Watch excerpts from the Video below:   And Check Out These Other Items...The Foundations Course is at the center of everything you’ll learn. Then the supplemental videos, the 10-Minute Foundations Workout, and our online tutoring will clarify and reinforce what you’ve learned, helping you apply your new understanding and skill set to the instrument. Check ’em out!Plus, we guarantee delivery of your course or we will refund your money. The Foundations Video Supplement  A potent addition to the Physics of Guitar Playing® Foundations Course, the supplemental videos include state-of-the-art animation and hands-on guitar demonstrations of key concepts from the Foundation Course’s 17 AXiom™ lessons.Watch excerpts from the Videos below:

 

 
 
  The 10-Minute Foundations Workout  This video course helps you apply what you’ve learned! It teaches you a short but comprehensive set of warmup “calisthenics,” demonstrated on guitar, that allow you to apply the 17 Foundations Course AXioms™. Hone your technique as you build understanding, knowledge, speed, dexterity, and finger independence—all in a quick, 10-minute daily workout.   Online Tutoring  As you learn the Physics of Guitar Playing® materials, you will be assisted by a certified teacher online who will answer your forum questions and every week give you feedback and instruction from videos you submit, all on your personal Student Learning Page on any device. Learn to play great even faster!   Beginner's Intro to Guitar eBook & Video

Most beginner “methods” are too complicated and detailed, and call for premature multitasking. In addition, this information is often randomly presented.The result? Students are soon overwhelmed, confused, frustrated—and they often quit.

This simple introduction will give you essential skills without overwhelming you and offers a logical order of simple techniques to learn, one at a time. If you are a guitar teacher, consider using this as an intro book and video course for beginning students.  Chords, Scales & Licks eBook  
In case you are aren't buried under these already, you can use this eBook, crammed with more scales, chords, and licks than most of us could use in five lifetimes. Memorize ’em. Collect ’em. Trade ’em with your friends. And then use what you learn from the Physics of Guitar Playing® Foundations Course to put them to use like a pro.   The Physics of Guitar Playing Embroidered Cap   White hat, black brim— a high-quality hat with our logo embroidered up front! story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here's more about Hannah Rose Kaufmann and her music.

  • Hannah is a triple-endorsed upcoming singer-songwriter.
  • This campaign is important because it is more than recording music, it is sharing the stories.
  • With your help, we can share these stories and help spread quality music.  These songs will inspire others to build confidence in themselves outside of superficial values.

What We Need & What You Get

Breaking it down:

  • We're trying to raise $1,000 to record fifteen songs.
  • All acoustic, just vocals and guitar to highlight the songwriting component.
  • If we don't reach our financial goal, we'll negotiate. (Hannah is a Business student!)

The Impact

The difference your contribution will make:

  • This project can only be successful with your help, and it will pave the way for more artists like Hannah to create music that builds people up and breaks down the misconceptions in society that are created by music that is centered solely around high quality sound, and not feeling.
  • We've been successful inspiring people before.  Help us do it again!
  • Do you really want to get involved?  Talk to Hannah on Facebook and share this with your friends. www.facebook.com/hannahrosekaufmann

Risks & Challenges

Let's be real.  Transparency!

  • Perseverance and determination are a theme in Hannah's life.  She wasn't supposed to be successful, but through her honest work ethic, she has managed to maintain a growing music career while earning a Bachelor's in Business Administration with a minor in Music Management, with a GPA over 3.5!
  • When faced with obstacles, rather than figure out a way around them, Hannah always makes sure it is impossible to move forward the original way planned.  If things really get rough, she has a support team that helps her navigate the next steps.  Including a personal manager, business manager, and management company, all of whom are ready, willing, and able to assist and contribute with their varied skill sets.  Go team!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Share Hannah's music and Indiegogo campaign with your friends on social media!
  • Share your music with the world too...

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Who am I?

I am a Jamaican born Singer/Songwriter/Musician. I've been a Christian since i was eleven (11) years old. I wrote my first song at thirteen (13) years old after which songwriting became almost like a musical diary to me where i get to pour out about whatever my meditation is on. I've been doing praise and worship at various churches: Christ Alive Christian Center with Pastors Dean Brown and Pastor Baker, Faith Cathedral Deliverance Center with Pastor & Bishop Blair, Lighthouse Church of God with Pastor Alldredge and Pastor Gresham. These men and woman of God have all ministered to me, encouraging me to do that which God has called me to do. I released my debut album "Shelter of Love" in Jamaica in February of 2012. Now God has blessed me with inspiration once more to start this project - Love Personified: The Movement.

 

Why Should You Be Interested?

This project is important to me because it is totally dependent on God's provision through you. This is faith put into action. I have not released any new music in five (5) years and now i am itching to get these songs out there to you. They have been a blessing to the few ears that have heard them so far but now i want you to hear them and be blessed also.  This project is a global challenge to all of us to see why God is so big on love and why we must strive to be the same with one another. 

 

What I Need & What You Get

This six-track project needs $7500 USD to be completed and airplay ready, That total will cover the following:

  • Unlimited studio time for the duration of the project
  • Professional Musicians, Background Vocalist(s), studio producer and engineer
  • Cost to completely mix, master and finalize the project
  • Professional Photo Shoot and Album Design 
  • Performance Soundtracks
  • Digital distribution to major online outlets. such as Itunes, CDBaby, Amazon etc.
  • Copyrighting, Mechanical Licensing, etc.
  • 500 count Packaged CDs.

The Impact

Love Personified came from what started as an internal interrogation at a bus stop and turned into a prayer asking God for that unconditional love to love others even when you've been hurt and to reach out in love to those you don't even know are hurting just like you. Instead of all of us shutting down and hiding within ourselves because we don't want to be vulnerable again. Our love is conditional, we all have stories of how we said we would never fall in love again, or we would never trust someone again etc. These are the times when that love is tested and oftentimes destroyed. But, what if we dared to continue to love even in the face of our enemies. Could we ever find it in ourselves to be unwavering in our love for the people who are actively seek our destruction?

There are songs of encouragement, songs of adoration, worship and meditation and songs that challenge your heart about decisions we've made in our lives as Christians.

Risks & Challenges

It is difficult to fund an album yourself when you are an independent artiste, but with your help and you believing in me to accomplish this - It will be done and it will be AMAZING!

I am trying by all means to fund this project because i believe God wants to do something with these songs. I also believe that once you hear them you too will catch the vision and it will be made plain. This is a movement and i pray it will spread across the world. 

The producers have heard the demos and they are chomping at the bit so to speak to get started on this new and innovative project. New sounds, new genres, even what i'm known for - Praise and Worship, will be making its appearance on the album this time. I wasn't so fortunate the first time around with "Shelter of Love". There's a little bit of everything coming at you on this project so please help me make this happen.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share this on all your social media feeds. Tell as much people as you can about the Love Personified Movement. To do this use the Indiegogo share tools. #lovepersonified

It is difficult to fund an album yourself when you are an independent artiste, but with your help and you believing in me to accomplish this - It will be done and it will be AMAZING!
I am trying by all means to fund this project because i believe God wants to do something with these songs. I also believe that once you hear them you too will catch the vision and it will be made plain. This is a movement and i pray it will spread across the world. 
The producers have heard the demos and they are chomping at the bit so to speak to get started on this new and innovative project. New sounds, new genres, even what i'm known for - Praise and Worship, will be making its appearance on the album this time. I wasn't so fortunate the first time around with "Shelter of Love". There's a little bit of everything coming at you on this project so please help me make this happen.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
Share this on all your social media feeds. Tell as much people as you can about the Love Personified Movement. To do this use the Indiegogo share tools. #lovepersonified

story:
Summary

  • We are Orchestra Excellence. Our mission is to unite young people of the world and to empower them with creativity and inspiration.
  • We believe that we can change the world by playing beautiful music with excellence and passion and bringing together the best musical talents from around the globe for an engagement in joyful and meaningful music making.
  • We want to wipe off the borders and demolish walls when it comes to creating, understanding and learning together.
  • We want to equip young musicians with a new understanding of how to navigate their musical career path.

Orchestra Excellence and Suoni dal Golfo Music Festival give young musicians a unique opportunity to work together with their colleagues from different countries. They will have a chance to express their ideas, propose programmes, create ensembles, to perform in various concerts as soloists or parts of the orchestra. They will receive coaching and guidance from the best professionals in the field and will be able to take back home some invaluable experience and knowledge.

What We Need & What You Get

We are asking you to contribute as much or as little as you can to help our vision for the inaugural Orchestra Excellence Festival to take place.

You should donate because:

  • Music and art are the most powerful communicators between people and we need to support them if we want to remain connected.
  • Young and upcoming musicians find it very difficult to develop their talent in the commercialised world. If we help them, not only the artists but the art itself will develop and flourish.
  • In two weeks of the Festival, we will produce a number of exciting, fresh and excellent performances that will allow the audience to see and hear new talent, new music, and to engage with arts at a new level.
  • Without the help of the benefactors, music has very little chance to develop and grow as a vital part of the world economy.
  • We would like to put Suoni dal Golfo on the world map as a place of artistic power and inspiration for people who are involved with music and art. 
  • We would like to create a community around Orchestra Excellence that would include not only musicians but all music lovers. We would like you to feel you are a part of it.

Be our supporters, be our players, be our audience - this project is inclusive and we value every donation, every opinion, every comment or share. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot donate, you can still give us a hand! 

  • Share this campaign on your social media account.
  • Like our Facebook page
  • Follow us on Twitter
  • Wish us a good luck in a comment.

THANK YOU!

story:
The fundraising is for my friend, Shahd Syoufi, who is an extremely talented and fiercely passionate musician. Shahd comes from the city of Homs in Syria. Presently, she lives in Germany where her family moved in 2013, given the situation in Syria, because of the civil war.

"I have dreamed of becoming a singer since the day I learned to talk, maybe even before that", she would say when asked about her dreams.

As a kid, she was encouraged to pursue her passion for singing where she used to perform at school functions and sometimes at family gatherings. But coming from a society where music, dance and other such art forms are mostly frowned upon when pursued by women, she lost the support when she came of age.

But, things changed (mostly for good) when she moved to Germany where she is more free from the boundaries of a restrictive society. She is twenty-three and studying at the University of Stuttgart. She is a fierce advocate for women's rights especially in the Arabic world and wishes to inspire women to pursue their passions and dreams and fight the restrictions of the society they live in.

She has kept alive her passion for singing through her youtube channel where she uploads English and Arabic songs. Currently, she is working on her first original single. The song will be in Arabic, and will urge women to think about their lives and think freely. But, being a student, and trying to live independently without depending on her parents for finances, while facing criticism from her community, she needs our help.

I am trying to raise funds to help her with the logistical expenses of producing the song. If you are willing to contribute (any amount) please do not hesitate to contact me for any details.

Here are a few of her Covers - 

https://m.soundcloud.com/shahd-sy/my-immortal

https://m.soundcloud.com/shahd-sy/adele-someone...

https://m.soundcloud.com/shahd-sy/sia-soon-well...

 

You can also find her on her facebook page - https://goo.gl/VGW119

story:
To My Friends, Fans, and Music Lovers everywhere,

I’m raising funds to complete my new record, A Woman’s Story. I feel this is the best work I’ve done to date.  You may know me from my past work singing for some of the great singers in music.  I’ve been fortunate enough to have the opportunities to work with these amazing singers and musicians.  Now, I’m ready to present to you a body of work that really represents me as an artist and a singer.

A Woman’s Story tells my story of becoming a woman through different periods of my life. This record has been over 3 years in the making, and a good part of that time was spent selecting what to sing!  I’m singing and interpreting songs we know and love, some written by special songwriters like Janis Ian, Lisa Sanders, and one of my favorite songwriters - Joni Mitchell.

One song on the album is called “At Seventeen,” written by Janis Ian.  Janis is an incredible songwriter and a friend of mine.  Believe it or not, I was very shy at a young age and I never felt like a pretty girl. I was a dark-skinned girl with kinky hair and my idea of pretty is what I saw on TV. I had no one I could identify with and felt very much alone. This song was powerful for me and I know I’m not the only person who has felt this way. I’m excited for you to hear my interpretation of her work. Here is a performance I did for The Black & White Sessions.


I’m also paying tribute to some of the great men I’ve been fortunate enough to work with, like Luther Vandross, Marvin Gaye, and Donny Hathaway.  Donny and Tennyson Stephens wrote one song I’m singing. It was actually written for me and was sent to Quincy by Phil Upchurch.  Because of that song, Quincy sent for me to be the soloist for his Body Heat tour. Talk about full circle!

This is a project that is near and dear to my heart and I feel my friends and fans, both old and new, will love it as much as I do.

WHY NOW?

Like I said before, this has been a work in progress for the last three years. I’ve put out albums before, but I have yet to put out an album that totally is about what I wanted to do. I’m really giving you everything I got on this record. And, given all that is happening in society today, a woman’s perspective is so necessary. These songs are experiences in my life that I needed to share.

THE TEAM.

I’ve been blessed to have two-time Grammy Winner Kamau Kenyatta as the producer for this project. He’s worked with artists like Gregory Porter, Kathy Kosins, Daneen Wilburn, and more.

Kamau recommended all these musicians because he knew their work and he knew me. He thought that their work combined with mine would be a good fit. Here is the team.

Producer – Kamau Kenyatta
Kamau is an amazing musician in his own right and his body of work as a producer speaks for itself!

Drums – Terreon Gully
Terreon is a Grammy award winning drummer who drums have graced the projects of Christian McBride, Me’Shell NdegeOcello, Lauryn Hill, and more.

Bass – Trevor Ware
This Grammy nominated bassist has played with the likes of The Count Basie Orchestra, Kenny Burrell, Molly Ringwald, and more.

Trumpet – Curtis Taylor
This Grammy winning musician is a rising star in the jazz scene. He has recorded and performed with artists like Ed Motta, Patrice Rushen, Billy Childs, and more.

Keys – Hugo Suarez
Hugo is a young jazz talent who brings a new breath of air to this record. His skills have made him one of the top pianists in San Diego.

Percussion – David Castañeda
David has been an in-demand performer in Southern California playing everything from salsa to modern jazz. He is currently finishing up his doctorate in ethnomusicology at UCLA.

Mix engineer – Paul Tavenner
Paul has been engineering and mixing records for over 20 years. He specializes in jazz and he has been making these songs shine!

This incredible group of musicians really made me want to live up to the brilliance that they brought to the album.

BUDGET

This record is almost completed. I’m asking you to help me raise $11,000 to help pay for the following.

$4000 to complete mixing
$2000 for photos and the album cover
$3500 for videos
$2500 for a digital promotions/PR

The whole album has already been recorded. I’ve already spent upwards of $40,000 for studio time, musicians, background singers, logistics, and more. I share this with you to emphasize the fact that I’m in this with you! I need a little help to get over the hill to complete this project.

PERKS

I’m so thankful for your help that I am excited to offer a variety of perks you will love.  Get the album in advance, get a voice lesson from me, get tickets to a show, get handwritten lyrics from one of the songs, be credited as an Indiegogo executive producer – there is so much for you to enjoy!

Thank you so much for helping me with the final push for this album. It means the world to me and I’m so excited to share this with you!

Love,

Paulette

story:
About me

I am a singer/songwriter and have previously made three solo Albums, and prior to this played in a band "Indigoecho" 

What's this all about then?

My new recording is called "7"  and it is looking at how there are patterns of rest found in "7". it is a good idea rest on the 7th day, it is good to rest on the 7th week and people often get a chance to change rhythm in the 7th year. We tend to think of the day as having 3 parts but many years ago there were actually 7 parts. This recording will explore what different stages look like and will reflect this lyrically and musically in a creative way. 

Why support it?

In Supporting this recording  I hope you will be enjoy it and can take time to listen to it in the car, on a run, in the gym or in the stillness of your house. We live in age where there are countless albums to stream on Spotify and Apple.  I love supporting artists I know and who are independent. In backing this recording you will help me  independently produce songs and keep creativity alive.

What's the craic?

So what does this involve? 

It involves recording costs in the studio 

It includes designing the CD 

It also includes manufacturing the CD (they actually all go off to a factory and get made by the CD making people in long coats)  

When you add this all up its around  £3000 - who knew CD's cost so much? we thought they got made for free!

What will happen if you support it

 

You will get a warm fuzzy feeling inside :) Your support also  enables me to make this new recording and for others to hear these new songs.

I have made three albums before (I am not a rookie) I will also be recording it with my producers Graeme Duffin (Wet, Wet, Wet) and Sandy Jones, It was great to have so many people support my last recording and I would you to be part of this one too. 

 

Making a new recording involves a lot of time, energy and creativity and I would love you to support this through giving, and it would be such and encouragement to me if you can get on board. with supporting this :)

story:
The Story:

I simply MUST do this. I am compelled. It is my mission and purpose in life to create music.

I have tried to get out of this and run, but there is nowhere to hide. 

About 14 years ago after a great upheaval and change in my life, I sold or gave away every piece of music equipment I had left,  I was happy to turn my back on music forever, live happily ever after as a “Regular Joe” with a secure paycheck and work toward a beautiful retirement during which maybe - just maybe - I might dabble in music occasionally as a nice hobby in my golden years. 

But little did I know that a second crisis/collapse was looming just ahead as my very successful and meteoric rise in the non-music corporate world was coming to an abrupt end as quickly as it had started after only 7 years. I won’t go into all the details, but let’s just say every “Here’s your sign” joke and obvious closed door / open door directive from all of creation pointed in unison toward getting back into music. 

So off I went into yet ANOTHER career change within a few short years but this time I was in my fifties and not getting any younger! 

But an amazing thing started to happen IN me as all these things were happening TO me. 

I learned that I just happened to be good at music so I just need to be OK with that and stop fighting it. What else could I do?

I feel I am just barely beginning to find peace by stepping confidently into the depths of what I have been made to do. That is what the launch of this Third Leg, these recordings, and this campaign is all about. Please join me in this adventure! 

 

The Music:

Although THE STORY is the Big Idea behind all this and what I want you to get behind and support, here’s some of the nuts and bolts about all of this, including the beautiful music this project will give life to:

You can see samples of music to be included in these recordings below the intro video at the top, as well as periodically through social media throughout the campaign. Be sure to take some time to enjoy them now and to follow me in your favorite social media platforms (see links below) so you won’t miss anything! This is some pretty awesome music! You will not be disappointed!

The Instrumental Album will include piano and full instrumental original compositions. It will be beautiful background music in “New Age” or “Classical Crossover” styles. This album will also become the source material  presented in various formats for video synchronization. It will also be available at a later date in printed form for piano students of various levels to play.

The Cover Songs Album will be a selection of songs from among the hundreds I perform regularly in gigs at private parties and elsewhere. I will record piano/vocal recordings of songs selected by you if you partner with me at Associate Producer level or above! Songs span the last 100 years from early 20th century standards, later 20th century classic rock, and 21st Century singer-songwriters

The Christian Album includes many of the songs written and recorded during my earlier years traveling the nation and working in Nashville as a Contemporary Christian music artist, songwriter and worship leader. Although I no longer write or perform for this genre, these are some of my favorites that will finally be re-mastered and re-released with 21st century audio standards and formats.

 

What We Need:

Here’s how the money raised will enable us to complete the recording, editing, mastering and distribution for 3 of the 5 projects already under way, and maybe even give us a head start on the two scheduled for next year:

Unfinished Project 1 ) Editing and segmenting the instrumental recording that was previously composed as background music to a DVD educational series. These musical themes need to be divided into smaller segments for use as a listening project for CD and streaming and video synchronization.

Unfinished Project 2 ) The recording of many of the cover songs I currently perform regularly when I do background music or other performance gigs. I have always wanted to have quality recordings to sell at these events and also to use in promotion and distribution through streaming and other means.

Unfinished Project 3 ) Editing and re-mastering of a selection of songs from my earlier contemporary Christian and worship music recordings. By cleaning these up, many of these great songs may get a second chance to be heard by a new generation through streaming and other means.

All three of these projects will also need to have packaging and graphics developed for digital and physical distribution, along with as many professionally produced videos to accompany them as we can afford the time and money for. Also, any songs written by others will need to have licensing fees paid for the commercial use of them as well as proper credits developed and posted. There are fees to process each song for proper UPC coding, royalty tracking and distribution through independent music amalgamators like CD Baby or Tunecore, who will in turn distribute to the appropriate channels for streaming and sale around the world through channels like Amazon, Apple Music, Spotify and others. It's quite an interesting process and I'll keep you updated.

Possible start of future projects ) In addition, if time and money permits, I would like to be able to produce one or two more "teaser" recordings for the next two projects in the pipeline. These will be the singer songwriter genre of original songs that already has several completed songs, and the long awaited (and way too promised) upcoming Christmas recording. Those releases would help build more of a following before the full release of both those major projects, hopefully in 2020. 

 

What You Get:

There are perks and rewards tailored for every level of giving that will be sent to everyone who gives. Be sure to review the various levels of each perk that is displayed. You need to click on or tap each perk to open up the details for each. They are really awesome packages so look through the details!

Everyone will be kept informed of progress and pertinent updates, but to be truly a part of the community I would like to build around this, please consider supporting at the Associate Producer level or higher. At that level I will be getting back with you for specific instructions on how to help me complete each of these projects and what to include for future ones. I have lots of fun ideas to involve you with these and other projects as well, so I hope as many of you can be part of this as possible. It's just a bit more to get into that level from the all-music package, so go ahead! I know you will see it is worth it!

 

Risks and Challenges

Unlike some crowdfunding campaigns, this one will not be “All or Nothing”. If the full amount of the minimal goal is not reached, I will still be able to get all products described in the perks out the door using a larger percentage of funds from teaching and other sources than I would like to.   Regardless of the progress, you will all be updated regularly over the next few months through this forum and social media or email as you request.  

 

Other Ways You Can Help:

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • You can help get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • You can share, share, share! I guess the cool kids call it “Signal Boosting” (at least that’s what my son calls it :). So please give me “signal boost” by sharing this campaign with all your friends on social media and signing up to follow and “friend” me if you haven’t already. Then be sure to share or re-tweet my music and campaign posts (don’t forget to add your own comments) as they come out on these various platforms: 

Facebook: https://m.facebook.com/ronferlitomusic/

Twitter: https://mobile.twitter.com/ronferlito?lang=en

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ronferlito/

My Website: https://www.ronferlitomusic.com/ 

You Tube: https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCmvgClG1NSnluXngHZZtzvA/videos?itct=CA8Q8JMBGAEiEwjPyeuCwL3iAhVEocQKHSc4DKg%3D&hl=en&gl=US&client=mv-google

 

So I'm really looking forward to hearing from all of you. And feel free to contact me if you wish through here, through social media, or directly. This is a great opportunity to connect with people after being out of touch for a long time!  :)

About 14 years ago after a great upheaval and change in my life, I sold or gave away every piece of music equipment I had left,  I was happy to turn my back on music forever, live happily ever after as a “Regular Joe” with a secure paycheck and work toward a beautiful retirement during which maybe - just maybe - I might dabble in music occasionally as a nice hobby in my golden years. 
But little did I know that a second crisis/collapse was looming just ahead as my very successful and meteoric rise in the non-music corporate world was coming to an abrupt end as quickly as it had started after only 7 years. I won’t go into all the details, but let’s just say every “Here’s your sign” joke and obvious closed door / open door directive from all of creation pointed in unison toward getting back into music. 
So off I went into yet ANOTHER career change within a few short years but this time I was in my fifties and not getting any younger! 
But an amazing thing started to happen IN me as all these things were happening TO me. 
I learned that I just happened to be good at music so I just need to be OK with that and stop fighting it. What else could I do?
I feel I am just barely beginning to find peace by stepping confidently into the depths of what I have been made to do. That is what the launch of this Third Leg, these recordings, and this campaign is all about. Please join me in this adventure! 
 
The Music:
Although THE STORY is the Big Idea behind all this and what I want you to get behind and support, here’s some of the nuts and bolts about all of this, including the beautiful music this project will give life to:

You can see samples of music to be included in these recordings below the intro video at the top, as well as periodically through social media throughout the campaign. Be sure to take some time to enjoy them now and to follow me in your favorite social media platforms (see links below) so you won’t miss anything! This is some pretty awesome music! You will not be disappointed!
The Instrumental Album will include piano and full instrumental original compositions. It will be beautiful background music in “New Age” or “Classical Crossover” styles. This album will also become the source material  presented in various formats for video synchronization. It will also be available at a later date in printed form for piano students of various levels to play.
The Cover Songs Album will be a selection of songs from among the hundreds I perform regularly in gigs at private parties and elsewhere. I will record piano/vocal recordings of songs selected by you if you partner with me at Associate Producer level or above! Songs span the last 100 years from early 20th century standards, later 20th century classic rock, and 21st Century singer-songwriters
The Christian Album includes many of the songs written and recorded during my earlier years traveling the nation and working in Nashville as a Contemporary Christian music artist, songwriter and worship leader. Although I no longer write or perform for this genre, these are some of my favorites that will finally be re-mastered and re-released with 21st century audio standards and formats.

 
What We Need:
Here’s how the money raised will enable us to complete the recording, editing, mastering and distribution for 3 of the 5 projects already under way, and maybe even give us a head start on the two scheduled for next year:
Unfinished Project 1 ) Editing and segmenting the instrumental recording that was previously composed as background music to a DVD educational series. These musical themes need to be divided into smaller segments for use as a listening project for CD and streaming and video synchronization.
Unfinished Project 2 ) The recording of many of the cover songs I currently perform regularly when I do background music or other performance gigs. I have always wanted to have quality recordings to sell at these events and also to use in promotion and distribution through streaming and other means.
Unfinished Project 3 ) Editing and re-mastering of a selection of songs from my earlier contemporary Christian and worship music recordings. By cleaning these up, many of these great songs may get a second chance to be heard by a new generation through streaming and other means.
All three of these projects will also need to have packaging and graphics developed for digital and physical distribution, along with as many professionally produced videos to accompany them as we can afford the time and money for. Also, any songs written by others will need to have licensing fees paid for the commercial use of them as well as proper credits developed and posted. There are fees to process each song for proper UPC coding, royalty tracking and distribution through independent music amalgamators like CD Baby or Tunecore, who will in turn distribute to the appropriate channels for streaming and sale around the world through channels like Amazon, Apple Music, Spotify and others. It's quite an interesting process and I'll keep you updated.
Possible start of future projects ) In addition, if time and money permits, I would like to be able to produce one or two more "teaser" recordings for the next two projects in the pipeline. These will be the singer songwriter genre of original songs that already has several completed songs, and the long awaited (and way too promised) upcoming Christmas recording. Those releases would help build more of a following before the full release of both those major projects, hopefully in 2020. 
 
What You Get:
There are perks and rewards tailored for every level of giving that will be sent to everyone who gives. Be sure to review the various levels of each perk that is displayed. You need to click on or tap each perk to open up the details for each. They are really awesome packages so look through the details!
Everyone will be kept informed of progress and pertinent updates, but to be truly a part of the community I would like to build around this, please consider supporting at the Associate Producer level or higher. At that level I will be getting back with you for specific instructions on how to help me complete each of these projects and what to include for future ones. I have lots of fun ideas to involve you with these and other projects as well, so I hope as many of you can be part of this as possible. It's just a bit more to get into that level from the all-music package, so go ahead! I know you will see it is worth it!
 

Risks and Challenges
Unlike some crowdfunding campaigns, this one will not be “All or Nothing”. If the full amount of the minimal goal is not reached, I will still be able to get all products described in the perks out the door using a larger percentage of funds from teaching and other sources than I would like to.   Regardless of the progress, you will all be updated regularly over the next few months through this forum and social media or email as you request.  
 
Other Ways You Can Help:
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

You can help get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
You can share, share, share! I guess the cool kids call it “Signal Boosting” (at least that’s what my son calls it :). So please give me “signal boost” by sharing this campaign with all your friends on social media and signing up to follow and “friend” me if you haven’t already. Then be sure to share or re-tweet my music and campaign posts (don’t forget to add your own comments) as they come out on these various platforms: 

Facebook: https://m.facebook.com/ronferlitomusic/

Twitter: https://mobile.twitter.com/ronferlito?lang=en
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ronferlito/
My Website: https://www.ronferlitomusic.com/ 

You Tube: https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCmvgClG1NSnluXngHZZtzvA/videos?itct=CA8Q8JMBGAEiEwjPyeuCwL3iAhVEocQKHSc4DKg%3D&hl=en&gl=US&client=mv-google

 
So I'm really looking forward to hearing from all of you. And feel free to contact me if you wish through here, through social media, or directly. This is a great opportunity to connect with people after being out of touch for a long time!  :)

story:
♥ Welcome beautiful beings ♥

We need your help to transform our VW Luton Mobius Loop tour bus into a solar powered traveling stage & nomadic family home!

★ WHAT YOU CAN HELP US ACHIEVE ★

Mobius Loop will independently tour our music and host a roster of inspirational musicians, artists, storytellers, poets, educators, philosophers and thespians on The Hemp Redemption Stage.

Your contribution will help us develop a unique and imaginative grassroots touring stage powered by renewable energy, bringing our touring into the 21st century by reducing our impact on the environment whilst touring arts and culture far and wide, with the ability to perform in remote and populated areas, rural or urban and completely off-grid! Our Hemp Redemption Stage will aim to bring entertainment, education and inspiration to everyone we meet on our creative journey.

★ The Hemp Redemption Stage ★ will be fueled by renewable vegetable oils so that we can tour the UK in a sustainable way. Our solar powered stage will host conscious music, hemp educational talks, hemp spinning and weaving demonstrations, family entertainment, inspirational poetry and live performances.

We believe Hemp will provide solutions to many of our world's ecological, ethical and economical problems.

(below) Here we are together at Hempen Co-Op in Oxfordshire UK celebrating their annual hemp harvest!!

Mobius Loop have been an independent grassroots touring band for over a decade, performing hundreds of shows across the UK festival & concert circuit.

We write and perform songs about positive social change, peaceful direct action, conscious living, ethical and moral ideas, grassroots politics and democracy whilst trying to apply these concepts to our own living action.

 

♥ NOMADIC FAMILY ♥

Over the years Mobius Loop have become a nomadic family, traveling from festival to festival and living in our vehicle along the way. Now that we are touring with our rainbow baby, we would love to complete the internal conversion of our VW Luton into an insulated off-grid family home that we can live in all year round.

We have hosted our Hemp Redemption events at many festivals, community cafe's and peaceful protests and would now like to create a plant powered mobile stage that folds down from the side of our VW Luton to take our show on the road!

Your contribution will help us transform our tour bus into a nomadic home and touring stage that will host inspiring and revolutionary performances.

We already own the perfect vehicle to transform into the Hemp Redemption Touring Stage!

The vehicle is a VW with a diesel engine so can be converted to run on recycled vegetable oil. The van has a very strong chassis and minimal rust and has done very few miles, passing its last MOT with flying colours! The size of this van is perfect for traveling in and out of villages, town and cities as its not too long or wide whilst also offering ample space inside for our nomadic home and our touring equipment.

♥ MANIFESTATION ♥

★ We need to raise an estimated £25,000 to make this dream a reality! ★

INVENTORY :

  • Welded metal frames (stage)
  • Exterior paint
  • Mural artist, joiner, mechanic, auto electrician, welder
  • Stage steps
  • Signage
  • Insulation
  • Solar Panels, charger and interface
  • Stage lighting
  • Portable PA
  • Split charge relay
  • Vegetable oil fuel tank conversion
  • Bodywork preservation
  • Extended cab above drivers seat
  • External canvas structure to create stage curtains and awning
  • Internal modifications: kitchen, living space and equipment storage
  • Fit skylight and fan
  • Driving license for Katie
  • Backdoor steps and Verandah

WITH YOUR HELP WE CAN CREATE SOMETHING SPECTACULAR!

★ PERKS ★

We have created some exclusive perks to inspire your contribution to our campaign. Please take a moment to look through them all along the right hand side of this page! We look forward to honouring your unique contribution in whatever shape or form it takes!

 

★ OUR CROWDFUNDING EXPERIENCE ★

In 2018, we successfully ran an Indiegogo crowdfunder for our 'Gemi The Album' project (www.indiegogo.com/projects/mobius-loop-gemi-the...) which was recorded, mixed, mastered, printed and posted out to 385 Indiegogo backers on time by Autumn 2018, the success of which has inspired us to launch our new campaign on the same platform.

Our 'Gemi The Album' project subsequently attracted additional funding from Arts Council England for a 2018 UK Album Launch Tour. Since then we have given birth to our rainbow baby, independently booked, managed and accomplished another wonderful tour of UK based music festivals for 2019 and worked towards the launch of our new Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign for the 'The Hemp Redemption Stage'.

 

♥ COMMON-UNITY ♥

★ There are many ways to help us! ★

We are inviting you to help us make this dream a reality! If you are unable to make a financial contribution, you can still make a huge impact and show your support by sharing our campaign far and wide and helping us reach our target in the time frame we have set!! By sharing our campaign via social media and email, telling your friends and family over the phone and in person, and even going as far as to writing about our campaign on your body and stampeding naked through the streets of your local hamlet, village, town or city, you can be an integral benefactor to the success of our campaign which we hope will make you very proud!

 

INFINITE LOVE TO YOU BEAUTIFUL BEING ∞ ♥

story:
Short Summary

Epic Symphonic Metal band Ruins of Elysium is making history on the heavy metal scene for being the first ever tenor fronted symphonic metal band and our latest release, Daphne, was acclaimed all over the world as innovative, powerful and really, really epic. Because of that, many of our fans and supporters, whom we kindly call "Sentinels of The Starry Skies", have been asking for a physical version of it, which we can't make happen without the proper budget. So we ask for your help to relase Daphne in physical format with three very special surprises: the first ever EP released by Ruins of Elysium, Prince, completely free as remixed and remastered bonus tracks. But it is not over!
Our upcoming album is already written and ready to be produced. There will be 8/9 songs ranging to aprox. 75 minutes of pure epic metal and we can unveil the name of some of the tracks: "Kama Sutra", "Serpentarius", "Shadow of The Colossus", our own version of Amy Winehouse/TheZoutons classic "Valerie" and the gargantuan 40 minutes long symphony that names the album, "Seeds of Chaos and Serenity". Those seeds can't be sown without your help, so we are counting with your support on this new adventure, Sentinels of the Starry Skies!

What We Need & What You Get

Having an album printed is not a cheap task, so we need the funds to help bringing into existance the physical copies of Daphne, the EP that spread Ruins of Elysium's name to the world. All copies will come signed with a personal dedication to the purchaser by all the brazilian members and the remixed and remastered versions of the 3 songs of our debut EP, Prince: "Prince", "The Chronicles of Mist" and "Sentinels of The Starry Skies".

For Seeds of Chaos and Serenity, this task is pushed even further because we pushed ourselves even further on writing this album. The songs are all huge, orchestra-wise or lenght-wise (or both lol) and demand extra production, which will be in charge of Greek producer Georgia Damigou and our guitar player and producer Vincenzo Avallone. Not only counting production and studio time, we also need artwork, professional band photos, image manipulations for the social medias e don't forget the extra merchandise such as posters and t-shirts. If we don't reach our goal, the album will still happen, but it may take a little more time for the band to raise the money by themselves.

The Impact

The support of fans make all the difference in the crowded and even cruel music world of today. It is still hard for unsigned and independent bands to produce and release their material in the best possible ways, even though digital distribution has made it somewhat easier. The majority of Ruins of Elysium is based in Brazil and the scenario for metal and specially symphonic metal has been losing ground here, so it becomes harder and harder to produce and release an abum. With your support, we can overcome those obstacles and make not only the release of an album possible, but the release of two and also the making of merchandise for you, guys!
