story:
Hello there. My name is Dustin Tessier. I am a musician and songwriter. I am an advocate. I am an ally. I am out here in this world lending my heart and hands to shaping a world where love is a guiding principle. I have a music project by the name of Timbre Ghost. For those of you familiar, I am humbled by your support. If you are new to the music, I am grateful to have this opportunity to share it with you now.

A little shy of 2 years ago, I began working on the debut Timbre Ghost EP. It was a culmination of the process of making sense of years of struggle, of finding a voice, and of putting to rest a chapter of trying to escape the world around me. "The Ledger" was released in the Fall of 2016. It's been a beautiful process of coming back into the world. The music and band have been a joy to share with each and every person who has spent a moment with Timbre Ghost. The time has come to create and share the next work of heart. It will be a full-length release, and will be released on both vinyl LP and digital format. Your contribution and support will directly help this project see the light of day. Your support will foster this message of empathy, love, and understanding. Also, your support will help bring to life a pretty decent batch of songs and great record, if I may be so bold.

Let's talk details now. I seek to raise $5,000 funding for this project. Making records can be an expensive venture. Where I'm at now, I simply can't shoulder this cost. As tough as it can be to ask for help, I am here to do so now. Here's a little breakdown of where the money will go.

  • $2500 for studio time, engineering, and mixing the record
  • $400 for guest musicians & creative contributions
  • $500 for mastering the record
  • $1600 for production of LP's and packaging

Any funds raised above and beyond the campaign goal will be directly applied towards fulfilling orders & perks, and promotion of the record. And, speaking of perks? Yes, there are some delightful perks to be had! Interested in a Timbre Ghost T-shirt? Yeah, I got you. How about getting your hands on an LP, for that superb fidelity? Yeah, it's coming out on vinyl. Looking to finally get a copy of The Ledger on cd? There's a perk just waiting just for you. Am I serious about a lifetime on the guest list at any/all Timbre Ghost shows? Yes, that too is a perk. Lastly, will I really clean your house/apartment/condo/living space as a perk? Yes. This is not a joke. To see these perks, please make your way to the "Perks" page. 

In the event the goal is not met, I intend to apply every bit of money raised towards studio time, engineering, and mixing the record. I also intend to see everyone's perks met and fulfilled. This may present with a degree of difficulty, should the goal not be met, but it's a contingency I'm keeping mindful of. I'm in this thing to see it through to the finish, no matter what the outcome of the campaign. That being said, let's do all we can to meet this modest goal. 

As stated in the overview for the campaign, I seek to foster connections, share community, and to offer a lens through which to gain insight into experience. Communicating through art, through music, and through expression are the most direct means for me to get across. The songs written for this full-length record span the continuum of human experience. The content brushes up against the depths of the breathtaking and heartbreaking times we are living in. Dialogue is vital, visibility is crucial. I offer voice through experience. 

I plan to do all that lies within my power to see this project launched, funded, and completed successfully. Asking for help is always a difficult process for me. However, as noted in my video, countless life-altering shared and personal experiences have come into my life through the act of asking for help. I'm inclined to keep some details of the production of this project a mystery, as art doesn't always do well by explanation. However, if you wish to have a discussion, or have any questions on any aspect of this campaign, project, or anything else I urge you to reach out directly to me. I am an open book.

Any bit of support is going to take this thing far. Each and every contribution is important. If you are able to help by spreading the word on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, etc... please, you would be doing me worlds of assistance. For this, I am so grateful. Support through pledges, orders, donations... I am deeply grateful for any level you feel you are able to help. Indiegogo has some awfully convenient share tools to help promote this campaign, and so many other meaningful campaigns alike. Please, share and share alike. There is an abundance of love to go around. Thank you, sincerely. I wish you all the best. Here's to it!

- Dustin Tessier

story: They say it takes 10 years to find your sound, well, it's been 10 years since I've been recording and writing. This EP that I'm releasing is the best music I've ever written. This music video is completely different from what I've been doing before and probably the first time I'm actually damn proud of it. As cliché as it sounds, I WILL put my heart and soul in this video. Thank you so much for donating and being there for me all these years, I think I'm finally close to make you all proud:))

story:
Sup, 

All jokes aside, I've been debating internally for the better part of a year weather or not I wanted to release an crowdfunding campaign for my first full length record. When I'm not on the road, I've been working up to 70hrs a week between my jobs at the Butcher Shop and the Basement with sideman gigs and odd jobs sprinkled in. I'm still coming up incredibly short for what this record is going to cost and promote. Thus, I've decided to release this campaign. 

For reference here is a breakdown of what it costs to make and promote a record.

$1500- 3 days of studio time
$1500- in studio musicians
$2500-producing/mixing
$750 mastering
$500 for design/photos for record
$2000 for vinyl 12"
$500 for cds 

In other words just to make the record alone and have physical copies made runs about $8-10k. To give it a fighting chance with publicity is something even more monetarily daunting.

This is where you come in. I am asking for $5,000 to get this record finished. I'm offering standard merchandise perks as well as house shows, guest list spots, your name in the liner notes of the record, hell I'm even offering you dinner with the butcher. I can assure you that your contribution towards getting this record finished will not go unnoticed or be taken for granted, and will be used solely to help finish the recording of this record.
